content: stitched from the crown down this chic and stylish crochet sunhat is the perfect choice to keep you looking cool on hot summer days worked in the round the pattern features our 100% cotton lily sugar n cream yarn pick any 2 colors on this fun pattern that lets you practice single_crochet basic increases and color-changing techniques wear-with-anything flair makes this topper an indispensable accessory in your beach bag video tutorial by mikey from the crochet crowd https //www youtube com/watch v=y1k6btknw9e yarns for model lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m contrast a soft ecru 00004 1 ball contrast b meadow 01135 1 ball
